SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Maintain Established CloudCraze Solutions

Does your solution use a version of the managed package earlier than B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)? Keep your CloudCraze 4.8, 4.7, 4.6, or 4.5 storefront secure by default by applying available patches and completing required updates.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Salesforce CompatibilitySalesforce not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.


B2B Commerce Compatibility

Any org installing a patch for:

CloudCraze 4.8
CloudCraze 4.7
CloudCraze 4.6
CloudCraze 4.5
Request a Patch URL for CloudCraze 4.8 or Earlier
The URL for installing a patch for CloudCraze 4.8 or earlier in a sandbox or production org is available only by submitting a Support & Services case.
Patch Notes for CloudCraze 4.8
Several patch releases are available for maintaining existing implementations of CloudCraze 4.8. Some patches contain fixes that require manual upgrade steps. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous CloudCraze 4.8 patches. When you install a particular patch build, complete any required upgrade steps for all patches that precede the patch you're installing.
Patch Notes for CloudCraze 4.7
Several patch releases are available for maintaining existing implementations of CloudCraze 4.7. Some patches contain fixes that require manual upgrade steps. Each patch release is also cumulative, and contains all the fixes from previous CloudCraze 4.7 patches. When you install a particular patch build, complete any required upgrade steps for all patches that precede the patch you're installing.
